page.title: 10Home Life
page.content: Home Life for most families is based around the farm. Many families in the block are still engaged in agriculture. Most activities such as recreation or shopping have to be done outwith the area which has no such facilities. The nearest town for most of the block is Inverurie which is well served for shops, services etc. Aberdeen is only approximately 15 miles away and the large superstores on its perimeter are even closer in some cases such as ASDA at Dyce. Some few families in the area are new to the Garioch, drawn by the oil industry in Aberdeen. They tend to commute to the city.
